title: Did this physical reflection of Gaga's hand live?
subtitle: Unconnected images of Lady Gaga in fur (perhaps fake) and a little fox were circulated with letters claiming that this animal was whipped alive for the singer's closet.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The photos show a seven-month-old white fox who was whipped alive to make a fur coat for the music of Lady Gaga.
